summary: Lance and his team are bodyguards for NSA's head, who is sent by the president to a secret meeting in an empty hotel outside Bucharest. During the meeting, the hotel is attacked. By whom and why?
cast: Dolph Lundgren|Jerry Springer|Shakara Ledard|Thomas Lockyer|Caroline Lee-Johnson|Gerald Kyd|Ian Porter|Howard Antony|Geoffrey Burton|Iddo Goldberg|James Chalke|Leigh Zimmerman|Steven Elder|Radu Florescu|Ovidiu Niculescu|Cristina Teodorescu|Florin Roata|Loredana Groza
title: The Defender (El protector)
